bio.title: Who am I?
bio.p1: Currently pursuing a Master's degree in architecture and construction, I combine creativity and technical expertise to design functional and aesthetic spaces.
bio.p2: My academic background, complemented by practical experience, has allowed me to develop a deep understanding of modern design tools and sustainable architecture principles.
bio.p3: I am particularly passionate about integrating new technologies into the architectural design process, especially 3D modeling and virtual reality.

philosophy.title: My philosophy
philosophy.text: I believe in a human-centered approach, where each space is designed to enhance the experience of its users while respecting the environment. Architecture is not just about aesthetics, but also functionality, sustainability, and innovation.
